TouchBistro | Toronto, Canada | Full time On-site | Senior developer positions

TouchBistro is the #1 iPad POS system for restaurants in 37 countries. Our biggest differentiator as an employer is the fantastic work culture (4.5 glassdoor rating, higher than 96% of the “Best Places to Work in Canada”). Everyone is treated with respect as a valued contributor.

We’ve just raised a $16.3M Series C and are looking to ramp up development of our brand new restaurant platform. We’ve got some interesting technical challenges ahead and are in need of two top-notch senior developers, one front-end (React) focused, and one back-end (Node) focused. If you have professional experience in either of these technologies (and especially if you’re familiar with GraphQL) and feel you can add value to our team, please apply online at https://www.touchbistro.com/careers/.
